11 Afghan civilians by mistake

From the BBC: The US military in Afghanistan says it has killed 11 Afghan civilians by mistake in an air attack.

The story. Oakland police fired rubber bullets to disperse about 750 anti-war demonstrators on Monday in what was believed to be the first use of the projectiles against U.S. protesters since the American-led war on Iraq began.
